game.name: Blastroid
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Custom Volume Controls, Keyboard Only Option, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Blastroid is an arcade-style roguelite set in space. Players customize their ships by combining different engine and weapon systems, striving to survive against ever-evolving threats in regions swarming with enemy waves.
